Sentencas: We develop a multi-fidelity surrogate modelling approach to replace the complex and costly physics-based computer models that are often used in the optimization of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance, or the simplified models that are used in lieu of complex models.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: We extend multi-fidelity stochastic collocation through a feature engineering step, and eliminate the requirement for the exact low-fidelity output at the inference stage.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: In contrast to previous approaches, the surrogate model we develop provides detailed spatial information, rather than one or more scalar outputs.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: This allows for the incorporation of such information into the objective of the optimization study, with the flexibility to choose from more than one objective, such as a minimum, maximum or average.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: Furthermore, the detailed spatial information can be used for general design purposes, such as ensuring uniformity in reactant and potential distributions.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: From the results on a 3-d SOFC model, we demonstrate highly accurate predictions of multiple spatially distributed quantities at up to spatial 250,000 locations.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: The results are superior to state-ofthe-art multi-fidelity approaches, particularly for low numbers of high fidelity training points.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation

Sentencas: We use the surrogate model to optimize the SOFC performance with respect to different objectives (including with nonlinear constraints and multiple objectives), with results that are accurate and are obtained in a fraction of the time required for the full model.& COPY; 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Multi-fidelity design optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using a Bayesian feature enhanced stochastic collocation
